message.body: Hey, are you up to anything tonight?
Hey, I didn't know if this was actually happening so I made other plans. Sorry! Next week?
:/ I leave to Prescott tomorrow and get back Tuesday to show my apartment to my landlord. We could do something then, but most likely not unless I'm done
Shit, I thought you got back on monday. Caaaallllvinnnn
I decided to stay tonight so I could clean my apartment tomorrow and then stay a day later at my mom's.
really early.
Dude, I didn't know any of that. What now?
I dunno. We could maybe have lunch tomorrow or something. Do you work?
Yeah, at 1. When are you leaving?
I fly out of phoenix Wednesday morning, so I was planning on driving to my dads Tuesday night after my landlord looks over the apartment and hopefully gives me
my security deposit back.
I meant tomorrow! When tomorrow? You'll get it back as long as your disgusting kitchen is finally clean. :)
I'll probably leave around 4-5
Okay! Should we have lunch?
You've sent me the same text like 3 times!
Ha, I don't know why. I just had my phone replaced at the apple store today so maybe this one is acting up.
Haha, I thought you were just really excited about leaving at 4 or 5.
We can have lunch tomorrow. I just literally have no idea how long I'm going to be cleaning. But we could have lunch before you work.
Would that work?
Yeah, at like 11 or something? That's only like 2 hours before we never see each other again, but that works.
I didn't mean to sound cynical or anything. I guess I get confused about how open I should be with people in regards to how I feel.
Er-my-god, words.
You didn't! I'm just drinking so I'm saying things I shouldn't be. Be as open as you want to be.
Have you ever seen the movie Enter the Void? Nathan or Joey might have mentioned it to you at work.
I haven't! I wanted to when it came out, but I never did. I want to see it in a theatre because I don't think anything else will do it justice, which is totally inconvenient.
watching the clouds, or having a child, or playing an instrument, or dying or loving/living, or something.
to a new album, or making a new recipe, or dancing, or making love, or driving at night, or writing a play, or taking a shower, or hiking a mountain, or
Of course you can. I think you forget how beautiful life is sometimes. We don't have anything to be unhappy about, we're fucking alive
What time do you work until tomorrow?
I'm still planning on lunch at eleven. Let me know if you can't make it. If I don't get back to you in the morning, call me--I'll wake up.
Hi, wake up. Where are we eating?
I dunnnno. Is there anything you want?
They have a tofu scramble at Blue Willow that I really like, wanna go there? I want brunch food.
Yeah that sounds good. What time should we meet there?
At exactly 10:55
No. Just forget it!
60 I mean
UGH fine. 10:600 it is.
I want hash browns.
Potatoes!!
I'll be there in five or so
Weirdo Wells Fargo bankers were holding me up
"Blessed Events Photography" OMG it's perfect!
Haha, I don't even know what that means. I'm here though!
This is seriously horrible.
:( How bad?
Really bad. I can't cut through a lot of the grease and it's everywhere. I'm burning through cleaning supplies.
Ahhh, sorry dude. Spray it and leave it to soak for awhile. Just the kitchen is bad?
Those Mr. Clean magic erasers work unbelievably well. Okay, they are probably made by child slaves out of toxic chemicals that are denuding the rainforest and
planet.
Just read that online. I'm going to go buy a box of them!
Perfect! Who needs morals when you can get a security deposit back? Hope you can find a store that's open...
It doesn't appear that they are harmful from what I've read online. But who knows.
melting the polar icecaps even as we type, but they work and one or two swipes will take the grease off your wall. Sometimes, you just have to destroy the
I've read thay they're really more of a sandpaper type thing than chemical. It's probably fine!
